description.originalText: We had a trial run with Erika and she was excellent. The moment she stepped in, she was professional and definitely showed a high standard of care.

description.displayText:
It is a sincere pleasure to write this recommendation on behalf of Erika. Erika was our full time nanny from when my daughter was just a few months old through toddler years. She has become an integral part of our family and has helped us in countless ways, far beyond just the childcare duties. Our family decided to relocate to Maine, and the hardest part of the decision was knowing we'd have to say goodbye to Erika. 

Erika was amazing with our daughter and our daughter loves her tremendously. She guided our daughter through learning and enrichment activities on a daily basis, taking on different "lessons" as she begins to hit her various milestones. Inside the home they work on learning new words, developing creative skills, caring for her dolls and much more. Outside the home Erika takes her to the park to explore, the library, music class and the play gym to just name a few. They are always busy and having fun together!

Any family would be lucky to work with her!
description.originalText:
It is a sincere pleasure to write this recommendation on behalf of Erika. Erika was our full time nanny from when my daughter was just a few months old through toddler years. She has become an integral part of our family and has helped us in countless ways, far beyond just the childcare duties. Our family decided to relocate to Maine, and the hardest part of the decision was knowing we'd have to say goodbye to Erika. 

Erika was amazing with our daughter and our daughter loves her tremendously. She guided our daughter through learning and enrichment activities on a daily basis, taking on different "lessons" as she begins to hit her various milestones. Inside the home they work on learning new words, developing creative skills, caring for her dolls and much more. Outside the home Erika takes her to the park to explore, the library, music class and the play gym to just name a few. They are always busy and having fun together!

Any family would be lucky to work with her!
Can't speak to how she is with children, but she flaked on two meetings last minute (after I'd rearranged our schedule to meet with her), so frankly I wouldn't waste your time. Not reliable.

description.displayText: Erika is a wonderful caregiver. She is insightful, experienced, focused, and dependable. She took care of my son since he was one month old while I was at work. Erika was always on-time, communicative and responsive by phone and text. She is eager to help around the house with daily chores, and managed to help me take on large household tasks, like going through all our baby gifts and organizing my son's clothes by size and type. She also helped me reconfigure my dish-washing setup to make it easier to keep baby things separate from regular. She is detail-oriented, and kept careful logs of her days with my son. She was attentive to his development, balancing nap-time/health with education and play. All of this is great, but nothing matches how his little face would light up when she greeted him in the morning. So clear that he loves her. Erika is hands-down the best, and any family will be lucky to have her!

description.displayText: Erika took care of my son part time from babyhood to PreK and has been an occasional sitter for both my kids for years.  I have always known her to be punctual, responsible, conscientious, caring and fun. My kids are now 13 and 10 and are still delighted to see or hear from her! she's a professional who loves her work. Highly recommended.
description.originalText: Erika took care of my son part time from babyhood to PreK and has been an occasional sitter for both my kids for years.  I have always known her to be punctual, responsible, conscientious, caring and fun. My kids are now 13 and 10 and are still delighted to see or hear from her! she's a professional who loves her work. Highly recommended.

description.displayText: Erika has been babysitting my son almost since the day he was born. She's dependable, loving, energetic, and committed to giving him her full attention and care. She's considerate of my family's rules and preferences, and she is always available to give updates as well as her own recommendations based on her many years of experience caring for children. I recommend her without any reservations.
description.originalText: Erika has been babysitting my son almost since the day he was born. She's dependable, loving, energetic, and committed to giving him her full attention and care. She's considerate of my family's rules and preferences, and she is always available to give updates as well as her own recommendations based on her many years of experience caring for children. I recommend her without any reservations.

description.displayText:
Erika is a wonderful nanny for our son S.!  When leaving for work each morning she is with him, I never worry about him because I knew he would be cared for so well.  She has a lot of experience with children and has been able to provide valuable advice to us as first time parents.  

Erika is easy to work with and keeps a very open dialog with parents.  We've really loved having her and would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a nanny.

description.displayText: My family and I interviewed Erika. She's great, very knowledgeable about infants, lots of experience, and very professional. Unfortunately our scheduling would not have worked well together but we will definitely use her in a pinch!
